description:
Extend hammock season and protect your backside from wintery weather. Water-resistant and filled with water-repellent down, this underquilt handles morning dew while creating a cocoon of coziness. The adjustable suspension system adapts to your hammock and whatever sleep position you prefer.

  • Lightweight ripstop nylon shell with a water-repellent finish
  • Nylon taffeta lining
  • 750 fill-power DownTek™ uses Bluesign™ approved chemistry for water-repellency, and is antimicrobial and antibacterial
  • Differential baffles prevent insulation from shifting and creating cold spots
  • Fully adjustable suspension fits with most hammocks
  • Recommended temperature range -1–4ºC
  • Pairs with the Ignitor TopQuilt (sold separately)
name: ENO Blaze UnderQuilt
